name: Astalo
summary:
Ready, aim, slash! Astalo is a dungeon crawling action game designed for mobile.

+ One button hack and slash arcade game
+ Find secret treasures and collect powerups
+ Battle against evil monsters, skeletons, scary creatures and bosses
+ Travel thru multiple arenas
+ Unlock characters with different mechanics
+ Fight huge waves of enemies on the endless mode
+ Cool slow motion effects
+ Compete on leaderboards
+ Unlock achievements
